tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_text TEXT,
    post_image BYTEA,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content TEXT,
    image_url TEXT,
    likes INTEGER,
    comments INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_image_url TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    text TEXT,
    image_url TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    text_content TEXT,
    image_url VARCHAR,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE shares (
    share_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    shared_to VARCHAR,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
